Dec. 2, 1972 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Best section 2 band - Alloa Burgh. Best section 3 band - Greenock & District. Best section 4 band - Kilmarnock Youth. Best instrumentalist - euphonium of Whitburn. Best basses - Whitburn. 29 bands competed.
Nov. 29, 2011, 1:13 p.m. May 10, 2013, 9:11 a.m.
1 Whitburn Band Alex Fleming
2 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Enoch Jackson
3 Broxburn Public Band Archie Smith
Unknown Result Alloa Burgh Robert Stein
Unknown Result Inverclyde District Anthony Clucas
Unknown Result Kilmarnock Concert Brass Andrew Keachie
